item.title: About
item.description: About I am a third year PhD candidate at the department of economics at NHH Norwegian School of Economics and affiliated with FAIR-Centre for Experimental Research on Fairness, Inequality and Rationality. I am a behavioral economist who uses field experiments, lab experiments, and theory to investigate research questions in the areas of education, childhood development and social preferences. In my research, I examine social influences on individual behavior and beliefs as well as their potential consequences for societal outcomes such as intergenerational inequality.
